channel.title: Gpu-Programming on NeuronBit
channel.description: Recent content in Gpu-Programming on NeuronBit

item.title: Hello CUDA: the righteous way
item.description: In case you didn’t already know, CUDA is a parallel computing platform and API, developed by NVIDIA, that enables programmers to exploit certain types of GPUs. Not too long ago (around until 2007), GPUs were solely utilized for graphics rendering, and programmers had to depend on very specific graphics APIs to utilize them for solving general problems.
